attributes.action: give the people a referendum over the question of whether they would prefer to have foreign doctors who can speak and understand english than be removed from the EU to protect us from foreign doctors who cannot speak or understand english.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: recent events show that our government - unlike the French Government - are MORE interested in complying with fundamentally flawed EU legislation than challenging it.  This is mainly because our ministers know that they reduce their own prospects of lucrative EU employment following their demise from national politics the more they question EU diktat.  If they are not prepared to represent the people then the people  - like the Icelanders recently - must be given an opportunity to tell the EU that THE PEOPLE are not prepared to be endangered by their fundamentally flawed legislation even if the government is prepared to capitulate to it.
